name: Liar Trick -Psychological Crime Mystery
description:
[News]
An English version is now under development! Please add this game to your wishlist!
The Demo version supports English! Let's Play!

[Is your expression "real"?]
Human words have truth and lies.
There are fake and genuine facial expressions.
This is a new Psychological Crime Mystery that unravels "lie" from emotions!

[What kind of game?]
An adventure game that includes visual novel stories, facial expression analysis mode, Liar mode, and reasoning mode.

[Crime mystery of the "puzzle story" has begun.]
This is human drama featuring a variety of characters, and you are "Lie catcher".
Expose lies in human gestures, voices, and facial expressions!
You interrogate all suspects and discover their "suspicious" testimony.
But not all of them are guilty, deduce what is a lie and what is a fact, and reveal the truth.

[For creators]
Now, our circle is looking for translators and localization groups.
Translation target is "Japanese → Chinese" of this game, Please contact us.



　

Case No. 1 [The Detonation Circuit]
An explosion occurred in the police vault, killing a female police officer.
[Patrick] (main character) and [Aska] (assistant) cooperate with a detective [Orco] to challenge the case.
The first one to interrogate was the bomb squad police officer [Hide], who was a boyfriend of the deceased female police officer [Prisca Sagrada].
At the same time, the existence of the bomb maniac [Nobu] who made the circuit that started the incident was revealed.
[Patrick] makes a decision while the investigation is stalled for the truth.


Case No. 2 [The Disappearing Corpse]
A "cut wrist" was found in a suburban park, and [Patrick] and [Aska] were summoned.
The victim is identified by DNA from the wrist, and the situation is heard at the clinic managed by his wife [Dr. Ringfing].
Her patient [Hiro] was a stalker for [Dr. Ringfing] in the past, so he is treated as a suspect.
[Patrick] and [Aska] who doubted the police investigation...


Case No.3 [Fraudulent Existence]
An urgently arranged special fraud group runs an escape drama in a downtown area, and three members are eventually arrested.
And the stabbed body of its leader [Pieri "Pierrot" Borgia] was found in their office and an investigation into the murder began.
However, three of the members [Humon "Hominid" King] [Browy "Eyebrow" Prost] [Tuto "2Tall" Amazov] were poisoned by someone with LSD, so they claimed that they had no memory at the time of the incident, and the interrogation went into parallel lines.
In addition, the existence of a son [Tokugawa] of the fraud victim who was detained at the scene of the incident emerged, and the investigation of [Patrick] and others was confused.





He is "Lie catcher". He Loves Good and Evil.


She is a Sidekick. She Loves Heart and Honesty.


He is a Detective. He Loves Justice and Trust.


She is a Pharmacist. She Loves Cure and Sacrifice.


She is a Official of Police. She Loves Judgement.
